title: President Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama to Honor 2012 U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Teams at the White House | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 29, 2012

 



President Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama to Honor 2012 U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Teams at the White House





	On Friday, September 14th, the President and First Lady will welcome the 2012 U.S. Olympic and Paralympic teams to the White House to honor their participation and success in this yearâ€™s Olympic and Paralympic Games in London.
